Nodes
0=I hear you are willing to help me?
1=I tried using magic to send the other watch-gnomes bread but I didn't do it right. I just want to collect all the bread again. 
2=I would try using a spell from your spellbook. Maybe you can teleport to one of the rocks across the river.
3=Did you figure out how to get across the river?
4=I would use a TELEPORTATION spell if I were you. You can copy it out of your spellbook and then cast it on one of the rocks that are across the river!
5=Can you deliver my presents to my friend now?
